Run all tests

This option allows you to run all the tests that belong to multiple modules of your project. Follow the steps below to do this.

  1. Click View in the top menu and click Command Palette.
  2. In the search box, type “Ballerina” and click Ballerina: Run All Tests.

What’s next?

  • For information on the next capability of the VS Code Ballerina plugin, see Graphical Editor.
  • For information on the VS Code Ballerina plugin, see The Visual Studio Code Plugin.
  • For information on the tools and IDEs that are supported by the VS Code Ballerina plugin, see Tools and IDEs.
